short_summary: Request for Cancelled Proposal for Cloud Technology from the Shared Services Canada department.
full_summary:
# Cancelled Government Tender Notice

### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01026037
* **Solicitation Number**: ESDC#001
* **Title (English)**: Cancelled-ESDC#001
* **Title (French)**: Annulé-ESDC#001
* **Date of Publication**: February 16, 2023

### Tender Status
* **Tender Status (English)**: Cancelled
* **Tender Status (French)**: Annulé

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Enterprise IT Procurement - Cloud Services
* **Contact Email**: [pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

### Vendor Selection Criteria
* Not specified

### Trade Agreements
* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Atlantic Procurement Agreement
	+ Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Quebec-New York Corridor Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
	+ Land Claim Set Asides (LCSA)
	+ Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
	+ General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contracting Entity Information
* **Entity Name (English)**: Shared Services Canada
* **Entity Name (French)**: Services partagés Canada
* **Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Notice Details
* **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice Type (French)**: Dem
